Package com.marklogic.semantics.jena.client

Contains classes that interact with the MarkLogic Java Client API.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JenaDatabaseClient
    A class to encapsulate access to the Java API's DatabaseClient for Jena users.
    OutputStreamRIOTSender
    Encapsulates a writer that can send an output stream from RIOT to a MarkLogic Java CLient API OutputStreamHandle.
    QuadsIterator
    Returns quads as elements in an iterator, by processing the special purpose SELECT ?g ?s ?p ?o pattern
    TripleBuffer
    Base class for buffer than handles deletes and adds for graphs backed by MarkLogic
    TriplesDeleteBuffer
    A Timer task that accumulates triples to remove from the DatasetGraph and periodically executes SPARQL UPDATE to delete them.
    TriplesWriteBuffer
    a timer task that flushes a cache of pending triple add statements periodically.
    WrappingIterator
    Adapts iterator from MarkLogic's Iterator<String≥ to Jena's Iterator<Node$ge;

Package com.marklogic.semantics.jena.client Description

Contains classes that interact with the MarkLogic Java Client API.
